#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
char arr[100001];
int num[10] = { 0 };
int apl[26] = { 0 };
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> arr;
		for (int i = 0; arr[i] != '\0'; i++)
		{
			if (isalpha(arr[i]))
			{
				apl[arr[i] - 'a']++;
			}
			else
				num[arr[i] - '0']++;
		}
		int ind1, ind2;
		ind1 = ind2 = 0;
		for (int i = 0; arr[i] != '\0'; i++)
		{
			if (isalpha(arr[i]))
			{
				while (!apl[ind2] && ind2<26)
				{
					ind2++;
				}
				arr[i] = 'a' + ind2;
				apl[ind2]--;
			}
			else
			{
				while (!num[ind1] && ind1 < 10)
					ind1++;
				arr[i] = '0' + ind1;
				num[ind1]--;
			}
		}
		cout << arr << endl;;
	}

return 0;
}
